Fields

| Improve this Doc View Source

ConvertCoordinateSystemOptions

Options for GdalWarp to convert GeoTiff's coordinate system;

Requires you to add target system param (-t_srs). Included default args: 

-overwrite -multi -srcnodata 0
-of GTiff -ot Byte

Declaration
public static readonly string[] ConvertCoordinateSystemOptions
Field Value
Type Description
System.String[]
| Improve this Doc View Source

TempFileName

Name for temporary (converted) GeoTiff

Includes .tif extension, looks like: _tmp_converted.tif

Declaration
